title: About Worlds 2019 pass (missions\all)4600  Orange Essence
body: i don't receive 4600 Orange Essence, when i finish missions. only get a part of orange Essence

replies.body:
I guess if you change your language to chinese, it will show you 4600. But actually it's 1000.
如果你把客户端改成中文了，就会显示4600.其实就1000.

As Riven mentioned, the amount listed under "Complete all missions to receive:" is 1000 Orange Essence.

If you could point or link to where you got the 4600 number from that would be helpful.

Im sorry... 4600 orange essence from where?

Milestone 2 - Score 80 Points gives you 1000 Orange Essences. Where does the 4600 coming from?
